short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access and manage your prompts from The Prompt Index

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Prompt Index is the world's leading database of AI prompts. This extension allows you to easily access and manage your personalised collection of saved prompts from anywhere. With a simple and intuitive interface, you can quickly retrieve your favourite prompts, copy them to your clipboard, and even remove prompts from your saved list. Never lose track of your go-to ChatGPT prompts, and always have them on hand wherever you go.
